replies.body:
Good, none of these skins are anything I want (besides dat Raka skin).

My wallet is safe for next month at least. :D
There are absolutely none that I don't own already I'm so glad I'm safe too! :D
Well, that means you're already a victim XD
Just wait until the Teemoing Personal Sale. Your wallet is going to be empty again {{champion:17}}
PROJECT: Fiora and Pool Party Lulu looks pretty tempting. Should I go for it or not? o.0

My wallet rejoices for now.

However, if they release Elementalist Lux during this month, it will be weeping.
Dat Raka skin.  This guy knows what's up.
Riot you should open the vault...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
pls {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Can't wait for the new {{champion:202}} sk.... oh wait nevermind :(
Don't worry, Rap God Jhin will come eventually, I'm certain of it.
The most artistic champion with the least choice of art {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
.... I just realized I replied to the wrong comment. I meant to reply to the 'Rap God' one. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
You can usually hit "Edit" on your comments.
I couldn't help but laugh at your comment for five minutes straight. I still am.
Just me or did anyone else read this as 'foreskin' hehe.
You clearly profess no hatred of your life since there is no space in between the eyes and the nose.
Just bought Pool Party {{champion:44}} :(
Refund it then wait for it to go on sale...then you will have that extra RP...I did that before when a skin went to bogo last year on dragon trainer trist
Really? Does that actually work? o.0
Yes
Super Galaxy {{champion:105}} and Cottontail {{champion:17}}?!?! Can't wait to tilt people in soloQ!
I would just like to point out that it's been almost 2 years since Sad Robot Amumu was on sale... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I dont usually see people that use Amumu :P
why don't we just take everyone's skins, and divide it equally among all the players

because a lot of people would quit because they bought the skins they want and they got trash thye would lose a large chunk of the people who pay a lot of money in the game and riot games are a buisness that want to make money
Look at his user.
Because some level 1 noob will get DJ Sona and I'll be stuck getting Iron Inquisitor Kayle, with my Star Guardian Jinx taken away from me.
Look at his user.

Just spent money on that Kindred skin lol. Oh well.
Tip, never buy a skin or a champion with RP right before the beginning of the next month, or right before the next sales schedule comes out.
